Comment:
Hi everyone!

In Master Freddy's annotation tournament I now have 4 points out of 7 games and have chalked up my third win.  I take the black side of this Sicilian Grand Prix Mini Tournament.  I get into my usual bind in the middle game but somehow get out of it into a won endgame.  Anyhow.  Let's start the action on move 8 where I play Kc6.

34. Re4 - hmm, I think Bob is gonna pile up on that e6 pawn, what shall I do?  I know, in the endgame I will follow the maxim, passed pawns must be pushed!!   So b4 it is.
